Class Report

java.lang.Object
bto.EntitiesProjectRelated.Report
public class Report extends Object
Represents a report for flat bookings with configurable filtering and tracking.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Report()
    Default constructor initializes an empty list of bookings and sets the generation date to the current time.
    Report(String reportType, FilterCriteria filters)
    Parameterized constructor creates a report with a specific type and filter criteria.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    void
    addBooking(FlatBooking booking)

    • Report

      public Report()
      Default constructor initializes an empty list of bookings and sets the generation date to the current time.

    • Report

      public Report(String reportType, FilterCriteria filters)
      Parameterized constructor creates a report with a specific type and filter criteria.
      Parameters:
      reportType - The type of report to be generated
      filters - The filtering criteria to be applied to the report
